verbose_text: One of the best characterized signalling pathways activated by class I PI3K proteins are the Akt protein kinases that control critical processes such as metabolism and growth by phosphorylating multiple targets including FOXO (forkhead box O) transcription factors, TSC2 (tuberous sclerosis complex 2) and GSK3 (glycogen synthase kinase 3) [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: phosphorylating multiple targets including FOXO (forkhead box O) transcription factors, TSC2
